item.title: West End Lane outside Sandwell Mansions, 25th January
item.description:
With pavement repair works going on West End Lane there are temporary lights on the main road, but no temporary lights have been installed on Lymington Road or Sumatra Road and it’s causing chaos. In the last week, there have been significant tailbacks, some drivers are getting very frustrated and driving dangerously, and there is a lot of horn usage early morning, during the day and late at night, please can you urgently install traffic lights also on Lymington Road and Sumatra Road while the roadworks are being completed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 221, West End Lane, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins tipped over and young tree supports vandalised, 25th January
item.description:
I ran this path this morning, multiple bins have been topped over like the one pictured and lots of the young tree have had their supports taken out or valdalised. Two of the tree supports have ended up in the boating lake. Please can we have some repairs and would be good to see some enforcement action taken along this path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip on the corner of private properties and polluting pavements, 25th January
item.description:
Sunday morning going to church on 25th January 2026 and this is what you see on the pavement! Those apartments across probably have run out of bin space. This is household waste dumped on someone’s pathway. Please clean up and install a cctv because it is constant!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Anstridge Road, Avery Hill
Report on FixMyStreet
